item.title: Super easy image resizing in GIMP
item.description: Ever been here? I want to double the size of this image open calculator type in current width * 2 type in current height * 2 paste results back into the Create New Image dialog I’ve done that countless times. As I was about to do the same thing once more, I thought “Hmm, wouldn’t it be nice if we could do simple math inside the New Image dialog?
